item.title: Issue #1921 created
item.description:
XSLT: semantics of PatternVersionRange

In XSLT ยง3.5.1 The semantics of VersionTo and VersionFromTo are described as if the keyword to is always followed by a VersionPrefix, whereas the syntax allows a choice of a VersionPrefix or a PackageVersion.

This problem is present in XSLT 3.0.

See also Saxon bug https://saxonica.plan.io/issues/6746

Note also the absence of tests for the form to VersionPrefix.
